p: Welcome to the EasyApps Documentation Page.

EasyApps is a brand-new application solution for Discord servers. All actions can be executed directly from Discord. This guide is designed for all users, regardless of prior experience with other Discord bots. It provides detailed information regarding each command.
If you have any questions, you can visit our support server or go over the FAQ page. We are ready to assist you with your inquiries.
EasyApps is very easy to set up, requiring only a few seconds before you can begin building your applications.
To set up EasyApps, the server owner must run the command: /server_setup During this process, you will be asked to give:
After submitting the required information, the setup is complete. You can immediately begin creating and managing applications.
as always, your love alex xoxo
Here, you can find a list of all commands that you can use with EasyApps. Those can be used on your Discord server.
Commands that are related to applications.
Starts a process of creating an application.
Allows people to apply for an application.
Commands that can help you with the usage of easyApps.
Starts a process of setting up EasyApps for a specific server. More can be found in here.
Join our Discord server and do not hesitate to open a ticket. We are here to help.
